description:
Access your Microsoft SkyDrive content(www.skydrive.com) anywhere anytime from your webOS phone & tablet.

IMPORTANT NOTICE:
* If the App cannot display folder/files correct after upgrading from V1.0.1 to V1.0.2. Please logoff all the accounts, then re-auth the Windows Live access.

Features: 
* Support multiple (up to 3) Windows Live accounts.
* Access all of your SkyDrive content from your phone/tablet.
* Download files from SkyDrive to your phone/tablet.
* Upload photos, videos and documents from your phone/tablet to SkyDrive. 
* Manage your SkyDrive folders and files - create new folders, rename folders & files, delete folder & files.
* webOS 2.x Just Type search support.
* Support webOS Phone and TouchPad.

Usage Notes: 
* This is NOT a Microsoft product. 
* Internet connection needed for using this App. 
* Downloaded file stores under SkyDrive folder.
* webOS 2.x Just Type search depends on local cached data, may not 100% match the data in your online SkyDrive. 
* Uploads files from mobile to SkyDrive only supports audios, videos and document file types.


Support: support@talign.mobi

Please do send me email for support. I cannot help if you only leave comments here.


Version History:
V 1.0.1 
	First public release

V 1.0.2
	Add multiple accounts support
	Add Just Type search support
	Add rename folders and files
	Bug fix

V 1.0.3
        Add TouchPad support

V 1.0.5
        Update support mailbox and website
